actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wagner-Peyser Act to provide for a strengthened employment counseling and placement program for older workers and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides, under the Wagner-Peyser Act, for employment counseling and a special action program designed to identify employment opportunities for older workers as well as recruitment and placement services for such workers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wagner-Peyser Act to provide for a strengthened employment counseling and placement program for older workers and for other purposes.
